title: The assembly-line production of Henry Ford's Mo...

content.question: The assembly-line production of Henry Ford’s Model T automobile resulted in which of the following by the end of the 1920’s?

choices.label: A sharp decrease in railroad passenger traffic
The federal government’s abandonment of research on air travel
The development of a large international market for American automobiles
Widespread purchase of automobiles by average American families
Construction of the federal interstate highway system

content.answer: Widespread purchase of automobiles by average American families

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
